event.title: Our inaugural meetup!
event.description:
This will be our first meetup and hopefully a great start to our new Google Developer Group. We have 2 talks scheduled, and we are kindly being hosted by Just Eat who will provide beer and pizza. I wonder if they'll use their own app to order it?

Rough Schedule:

19:00 - Meet and greet, have a drink and get to know each other!

19:30 - Intro to the GDG, Google's global developer community

19:45 - Andre will give a show and tell on Google Pub/Sub, the asynchronous messaging service that Google use to send 500 million messages per second.

20:15 - Tim will give a demonstration of automating Google Cloud infrastructure with Terraform.

20:45 - Closing comments, further beer & pizza.

We hope to see you there, and in the meantime please find out more about our group on our main meetup page.
